docs.text: Admin Dashboard The admin dashboard is very simple. In this section, I will outline several features and how you can do them. How to add money to an account Via Dashboard Go to admin dashboard Go to Bank accounts Search player Click the options dropdown and click edit. In this edit box you can set the balance. Via Bot $egive <player: mention/ID> <amount> How to add properties to an account Via Dashboard Go to admin dashboard Go to Properties Click the + icon Fill out the information and press Create Property. You can put a property on the market via not putting in a property owner. Via Bot Create the property via $ecreate-property <property value> <property name> User will have to $ebuy-property <property name> Property names are CaSe SeNsitIvE How to delete/edit properties This can only be done via dashboard. Go to admin dashboard Go to properties Find the property Click the dropdown option You can find the settings per property there Tasks Tasks are used to give or take money from a certain role or person every x days. You can create one on both the discord bot or dashboard. Create a task Via Dashboard Go to admin dashboard Go to tasks Click + sign. Via Bot $ecreate-task <target> <amount> <frequency> Delete a task Via Dashboard Go to admin dashboard Go to tasks Press the bin icon

docs.text: Setup The only setup you will need to do is to add the discord bot to your server, and then continue to set the settings up via the admin panel. Warning The bot is REQUIRED to be on the server for the website to acknowledge your server. Warning If you are alread logged in and add the bot to the server, it will NOT show up on the serverlist. You are required to relog and it will show up. Add EcoPlay Discord bot to your Discord Server. Configure the bot via admin panel. Login > Admin Dashboard > Select Server > Server Settings Bot is Setup.
